title: Great Company
author: John Kismosis
reviewcontent: Had a great time with Ava, took her to Wakari dog park to play catch. Staff could not have been nicer would highly recommend!

title: Had a Ball!
author: Kamaru Usman
reviewcontent: Had a great time throwing the ball. Lovely to have a dog just when I want one. so glad this company exists A+++++

title: Friendly and Helpful
author: TheDoug94
reviewcontent: The staff couldn't be nicer and the dogs are fantastic! Very well trained took ronnie to the beach and he really oes eat everything!
